Container.Name: MongoDB-RocketChat
Container.Overview:
RocketChat MongoDB setup for Rocket chat. You may need to fix file permission for data on unraid! mkdir /mnt/user/appdata/mongodb/ chmod 777 -R /mnt/user/appdata/mongodb/
From Rocket Chat Maintainer Compose file: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/RocketChat/Docker.Official.Image/master/compose.yml
A MongDB with a Replica Setup, MongoDB from "bitnami" is a cross-platform document-oriented database. Classified as a NoSQL database, MongoDB eschews the traditional table-based relational database structure in favor of JSON-like documents with dynamic schemas (MongoDB calls the format BSON), making the integration of data in certain types of applications easier and faster. Released under a combination of the GNU Affero General Public License and the Apache License, MongoDB is free and open-source software.

Adational Requirmetn for the rocket chat stack: Please update, set and use hostname via extra parmerters. The hostname should be FQDN example My routers search domain is home.arpa so my FQDN and hostname I would set is mongodb.home.arpa example: --hostname mongodb.home.arpa
Adational notes to edit and add to Rocket Chat CA Template: In rocket chat add variable: MONGO_OPLOG_URL Example set it to: "mongodb://mongodb:27017/local?replicaSet=rs0"
Info Breakdown: mongodb:// < hostname / IP address of unraid if using hostmode>: <mongo port> /local?replicaSet= <database name default rs0>
edit template existing option for mongo URL: mongodb://mongodb:27017/rocketchat?replicaSet=rs0

Config.Name: MONGODB_REPLICA_SET_MODE
Config.Description: MongoDB replica set mode. Can be one of primary, secondary or arbiter

Config.Name: MONGODB_REPLICA_SET_NAME
Config.Description: Database Name of the MongoDB replica set

Config.Name: MONGODB_INITIAL_PRIMARY_HOST
Config.Description: set and use hostname in extra paramerter... Hostname of the replica set primary node (necessary for arbiter and secondary nodes)

Config.Name: MONGODB_INITIAL_PRIMARY_PORT_NUMBER
Config.Description:
MongoDB advertised port number. It is recommended to pass this environment variable if you have a proxy port forwarding requests to container.
If chaning mongdb port and in bridge mode be sure to update port again in advance settings

Config.Name: MONGODB_ADVERTISED_HOSTNAME
Config.Description: set and use hostname in extra paramerter... Hostname to use for advertising the MongoDB service... could use ip and MONGODB_ADVERTISE_IP key

Config.Name: ALLOW_EMPTY_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Permit accessing MongoDB without setting any password

Config.Name: TailScale Fallback State Directory
Config.Description: Fallback container directory for tailscale state information

Config.Name: Port
Config.Description: Docker bridge NAT port use same port set in MONGODB_INITIAL_PRIMARY_PORT_NUMBER
